general.gigTitle: design and develop stunning saas websites in framer

sellerCard.oneLiner: I Transform Ideas into Exceptional Visuals
sellerCard.description: Hi, I’m Awais Hyder, a web designer and developer specializing in WordPress, Framer, and Figma. I create visually appealing, functional websites, combining design and usability. My skills include HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Adobe Suite for an outstanding online experience.

description.content:
Welcome to Your Go-To WordPress Solution!


Services I Provide:

﻿

  • Fully Animated: Capture your audiences attention with vibrant animations that make your website truly unique.
  • 3D Web Development: Enhance your online presence with innovative 3D elements that bring depth and elegance to your site.
  • Modern Design: Keep your website stylish and up-to-date with contemporary designs that align with the latest web development trends.
  • E-commerce Solutions: Looking to launch an online store? I specialize in building secure and user-friendly eCommerce websites tailored to your business requirements.

Why Work with Me:


  • Expertise: Extensive experience in WordPress development across various projects.
  • Custom Solutions: Websites designed to fit your specific needs and preferences.
  • Communication: Open and transparent dialogue for a smooth, collaborative experience.


Thank you!

questionsAndAnswers.question: What's the typical turnaround time for a WordPress website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The turnaround time depends on the complexity of your project. For basic websites, I can deliver in as little as one to two weeks. However, more intricate designs or extensive functionalities might take longer. I'll discuss the estimated timeline during our project consultation.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do I need to provide website content and images, or can you help with that?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You have options. If you already have content and images, I can work with what you provide. If not, I offer content creation and image sourcing services for Free. We can discuss your needs during the project briefing.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What after-sales support do you offer?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I provide post-launch support to address any technical issues or questions you may have. For a more extensive ongoing support plan, I offer maintenance packages to ensure your website stays up-to-date and secure.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I make updates to the website on my own after it's live?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! I design websites with user-friendly content management systems, primarily WordPress. I'll also provide you with documentation and guidance on how to make updates and manage your site effectively. If you need further assistance, I'm just a message away.

reviews.comment: Honesty, one of the best Framer designer and developers on Fiverr. Awais really went above and beyond and made sure every section was perfect. I will 1000% be hiring him again.

Amazing developer & designer, very creative and has great attention to details. 
A pleasure to work with!

seller_response.comment: "Working with him has been an absolute pleasure. They are professional, responsive, and provide clear direction, making the entire process smooth and efficient.
